name: Diving Boards
description:
"Diving Boards" is a project I presented at my Artistic Diploma. That's why it's more an Interactive experience than a real video game. Play with a controller for a full experience.

In this experience, players will walk on water. Around them, there is plenty of minimal representations of diving board. Under their feet, a fascinating sinkhole.

The horizon is also a delimitation of space around us, it's what allow us to be in the center of that space. In my installation I propose an interpretation of what the horizon means for me. It's a promise of a whole secret world beyond the field of view.
